item.description: Trailhead:Take I93 north,exit at Lafayette Place on the east side of I93.We will hike the Falling Waters Trail to the summit of Little Haystack.Good views on trail and at summit.Twice this year the over 50 group has looked at Mount Lincoln from the Lafayette side,now we get to see Lincoln from the Little Haystack side.This is a strenuous hike. 6.4 miles round trip, 8 hours estimated time.------Steve------As a condition of attending this meetup you agree to release,hold harmless,and indemnify the organizer(s) and all members of this group from any and all claims for property damage,injury,illness and/or death,including those caused by negligence and or other reasons.You also agree to assume all risk associated with this meetup and agree to know and follow the Hiker Responsibility Code described at www.hikesafe.com
item.how_to_find_us: Black Colorado pick up truck NH2431202
item.name: LITTLE HAYSTACK MTN.
